_sText:
Inspired by murgle's "drift-style" maps but with a teleport-booster-loop gimmick.  
  
I originally made surf_perennial for a competition hosted by SurfHeaven back in June. With a two week deadline the map was kinda rushed but turned out better than expected, I did however want to add some bonuses and release the map for real after the competition was over...  
  
Now here it is 6 months later ????  
  
  • tier: 1  
  • stages: 2  
  • bonuses: 3  
  
It turns out i forgot to build cubemaps (resulting in no reflections) but I don't wanna recompile it. Hookzones are there and should be good. Map looks better with hdr on but you do you.
